LEDI.Name: Illusion
LEDI.Message: Solidity is a state of mind...

LEDI.Name: Showdown
LEDI.Message: A low gravity grenade fest.  Small and fast - death is quick!

LEDI.Name: The Amphitheater
LEDI.Message: As usual, the center is where the action is.  But if you want to watch from the sides, I'm sure that the others wouldn't mind . . .

LEDI.Name: Burn Lite
LEDI.Message: Lots of ammo and nowhere to hide...

LEDI.Name: Cowboy's Ice Daggers
LEDI.Message: Watch out for those daggers - they are deadly!  At the end of each platform is a jump pad...

LEDI.Name: Glasshouse
LEDI.Message: If you live in a glass house, you shouldn't throw stones.  But go ahead and throw some grenades.

LEDI.Name: Hornet's Nest
LEDI.Message: Hail to the queen of the nest.

LEDI.Name: Ring of Fire
LEDI.Message: It will set you on fire!

LEDI.Name: Square Three 1.0
LEDI.Message: Just another variation on the theme. Watch out for the Hector in the middle.

LEDI.Name: Square Too 1.5
LEDI.Message: Square One with a Few Extras.

LEDI.Name: Swarm
LEDI.Message: The hornets from hell built their home to avoid the HECTOR infaltration.
